author: Lucas Nolan, Lucas Nolan
title: Apple Gives $10M to Lady Gaga Fundraiser to Fill WHO's 'Solidarity Response Fund'
description: This week, Apple CEO Tim Cook announced that the company would be donating $10 million to the "One World: Together at Home" Chinese virus fundraiser organized by Global Citizen and the WHO alongside celebrity Lady Gaga.
content:
This week, Apple CEO Tim Cook announced that the company would be donating $10 million to the “One World: Together at Home” Chinese virus fundraiser organized by Global Citizen and the WHO alongside celebrity Lady Gaga.
